blog.title: Cleaning Tips & Advice
blog.subtitle: Expert insights and practical guides for a cleaner, healthier space

airbnb.title: Airbnb & Short-Term Rental Cleaning Checklist
airbnb.intro: Our Airbnb Cleaning specialists rely on this comprehensive Short-Term Rental Checklist to keep every guest space pristine, stocked, and ready for five-star reviews.
airbnb.introWithLocation: Our {{location}} Airbnb Cleaning specialists rely on this comprehensive Short-Term Rental Checklist to keep every guest space pristine, stocked, and ready for five-star reviews.

kitchen.title: Kitchen
items: Check refrigerator for leftover food or messes
Clean out crumbs or other messes from cabinets
Make sure hand soap is full
Wipe down counters and refrigerator shelves

bathrooms.title: Bathrooms
items: Clean sink and shower drains for hair and clogs
Spray and rinse shower and shower curtain

bedrooms.title: Bedrooms
items: Change and replace sheets and linens
Remove any trash from space and empty trash bins
Wipe down blades of any fans

livingRoom.title: Living/Family Room
items: Dust/wipe any furniture and high-touch surfaces
Remove any trash from space and empty trash bins
Sweep/vacuum space (including under couches and tables)

laundryRoom.title: Laundry Room/Utility Room
items: Check and clean up any detergent spills
Check laundry baskets are clean and ready for use
Wipe down exterior of washer and dryer

exterior.title: Exterior of Property
items: Clean BBQ grill or other outdoor cooking*

other.title: Other (General Prep)
items: Make note of other items in need of restock

subSections.title: Every 2-4 Weeks (Extra*):
items: Check for any burnt light bulbs
Check plumbing and faucets throughout property

subSections.title: 3-6 Months (Extra*):
items: Air out the property by opening windows and doors
Deep clean behind/under refrigerator and stove

notes: Extra Service will require additional time.
Checklist is a guideline and some homes can require additional time.

moveOut.title: Move In/Out Cleaning Checklist
moveOut.intro: Our professional move-out cleaning checklist ensures every detail is covered to help you get your full security deposit back.
moveOut.introWithLocation: Our {{location}} move-out cleaning specialists use this comprehensive checklist to ensure every detail is covered to help you get your full security deposit back.

kitchen.title: Kitchen
items: Wipe down exteriors of large appliances
Clean stove top and the fan area above stove
Clean backsplash behind sink and appliances

bathrooms.title: Bathrooms
items: Hand clean and dry bathtub and shower
Clean interior, exterior, and top of toilets

deepCleaning.title: Additional Deep Cleaning Items
items: Spot clean doorknobs and light switches
Spot clean cabinet doors and handles

moveOut.notIncludedIntro: Ensure this section is highly visible on your webpage
notIncludedItems: Anything above 10 feet (or anything that cannot be reached within a 3-to-4 foot step ladder)
Washing light bulbs (due to risk of breakage)
Putting away dishes (we don't want to stack things in a way you don't like, and reduce risk of breakage)
Hauling trash (we can only take the trash to your outside cans)
Cleaning anything that involves a high ladder or cleaning chandeliers
Cleaning pest infested homes (roaches, bedbugs, etc.)
moveOut.note: Note: Checklist is a guideline and some homes can require additional time.

quote.requestCustomProposalTitle: Request a Custom Cleaning Proposal for Your Business
quote.requestCustomProposalSubTitle: Tell us about your facility and cleaning needs, and our commercial team will prepare an accurate, no-obligation proposal. If you came from our estimator, we’ll pre-fill your details to save time.
quote.facilityTypePrompt: What type of facility do you have?
quote.serviceDetailsPrompt: Tell us more about your needs
quote.contactDetailsPrompt: How can our team reach you?
quote.consentText: I consent to be contacted by Red Rock Cleans regarding this request. I understand this is a no-obligation proposal and my information will be handled in accordance with the Privacy Policy.
quote.smsConsentText: By providing your phone number, you agree to receive SMS updates related to your quote request. Message and data rates may apply. Message frequency varies. Reply STOP to opt out, HELP for help. Consent is not a condition of purchase. See our Privacy Policy for details.
quote.thankYouTitle: Thank You! We've Received Your Request.
quote.thankYouMessage: A member of our {{location}} commercial cleaning team will review your information and contact you within one business day to schedule a brief consultation and walkthrough. We look forward to partnering with you.
quote.pageTitle: Request a Commercial Cleaning Quote | Red Rock Cleans
quote.pageDescription: Request a free, no-obligation quote for your business. Red Rock Cleans provides custom proposals for office, industrial, medical, and other commercial cleaning services.

estimator.costEstimatorSubtitle: Get a ballpark estimate based on national industry averages to help plan your cleaning budget. Then refine your estimate by selecting your service location for local labor rates.
estimator.nationalEstimateDisclaimer: * Estimate uses national hourly averages of $35-50 per cleaner.
estimator.localEstimateTitle: Get a More Accurate Local Estimate
estimator.pricingFactorsTitle: The 3 Key Factors That Influence Your Final Cost
estimator.faqQuestion1: Why isn't this estimate a final price?
estimator.faqQuestion2: Will a higher frequency lower my price?

timeEstimator.timeEstimatorSubtitle: Get a preliminary estimate based on ISSA industry production rates to help your business plan cleaning budgets and schedules. This is an estimate only; a formal quote requires a walkthrough and scope review.
timeEstimator.estimateDisclaimer: This estimate is based on ISSA production rates and is for budgetary purposes only.
timeEstimator.calculationExplanationTitle: How We Calculate Your Estimate (The ISSA Standard)
timeEstimator.keyFactorsTitle: Key Factors That Influence Cleaning Time
timeEstimator.faqQuestion1: Is this estimate a final price?
timeEstimator.faqQuestion2: Why is a physical walkthrough necessary?
timeEstimator.faqQuestion3: Can I use this to budget recurring services?

pageDescriptions.faq: Find answers to common questions about our cleaning services, pricing, scheduling, and more.
pageDescriptions.contact: Get in touch with Red Rock Cleaning. Contact information for all our locations including phone numbers and email addresses.

pageDescriptions.commercial: Professional commercial cleaning services for offices, retail spaces, and businesses. Maintain a pristine workplace environment.
pageDescriptions.standardCleaning: Comprehensive standard cleaning services for your home or business. Regular, professional cleaning that keeps your space fresh and inviting.
pageDescriptions.deepCleaning: Comprehensive deep cleaning services that reach every corner. Perfect for seasonal cleaning, move-in/out, or thorough home sanitization.
pageDescriptions.airbnbCleaning: Specialized Airbnb and vacation rental cleaning services. Ensure satisfied guests with spotless turnovers every time.
pageDescriptions.postConstruction: Professional post-construction cleaning services. We remove dust and debris to leave your new space move-in ready.
pageDescriptions.moveOut: Comprehensive move-out cleaning services. Get your full deposit back with our professional checklist and thorough service.
pageDescriptions.standardVsDeep: Understand the differences between standard and deep cleaning services to choose the right option for your home or business.
